column4: how do i see the desktop cube whats the shortcut(from keyboard of couse)
install ccsm
whts ccsm?
install ccsm, then enable in settings, activate
is compiz enabled?
also did you set to 4 sides instead of only two? in general settings (ccsm)
just a second let me enable mine
i just want the key
set 3d cube checked, active rotate cube checked then control alt left mouse drag
also control alt left arrow will work
you did do alt f2 compiz --replace as well?
try alt f2 compiz --replace
disable those repos as they no longer exist
how do i???
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list and place a # in front of those, save then sudo apt-get update
you will then need to upgrade as that version is end of life
then please pastebin the /etc/apt/sources.list so we can see any other problematic sources
at paste.ubuntu.com
not here; paste.ubuntu.com
please give us the url
those are all dapper repos, what does lsb_release -a say in terminal
paste.ubuntu.com with the output of lsb_release -a
